row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &MANDANT# = "ALL" :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' ! --------------------------------------------- ! Parameter für JOBI.SQL initialisieren: ! -------------------------------------- :SET &ORADB# = "DLLW1&IDT#" :SET &ORAUSER# = "bbsbat" :SET &ORASCRIPT# = "&PROGRAM#.sql" ! --------------------------------------------- echo ">>> Wechsel ins Arbeitsverzeichnis ..." cd &RUNDIR# echo rc_cd=$? pwd ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&ORASCRIPT# SELECT VALUTA_DAT, MANDANT, AUSLOESER_TYP_SKZ, CASE AUSLOESER_TYP_SKZ WHEN 1015 THEN 'LBS' END AS BATCH, SUM( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(VERARB_SKZ_VEK,1,3) = '000' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS OFFEN, SUM( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(VERARB_SKZ_VEK,1,1) = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ANFORDERUNG, SUM( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(VERARB_SKZ_VEK,2,1) = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ERINNERUNG, SUM( CASE WHEN SUBSTR(VERARB_SKZ_VEK,3,1) = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS WIEDERVORLAGE, COUNT(*) AS GESAMT FROM TBBAUSLOES WHERE AUSLOESER_TYP_SKZ IN (1015) AND VALUTA_DAT BETWEEN &VALUTA_VON# AND &VALUTA_BIS# GROUP BY VALUTA_DAT, MANDANT, AUSLOESER_TYP_SKZ ORDER BY 1,3,2 ; __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- ! Aufruf des SQL-Includes für csv-Ausgabe: :INC JOBI.SQL_CSV ! --------------------------------------------- ! Returncode setzen: exit $rc ! ---------------------------------------------
